title: Senior Software Developer
description: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze software requirements.
Design, develop, test, and maintain high-quality software applications.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code that adheres to coding standards.
Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality, consistency, and performance.
Work closely with UI/UX designers to implement intuitive user interfaces.
Keep up-to-date with emerging technologies and trends in software development.

title: VB.Net Developer
description: VB.NET PG class recruitment *Currently under manufacturing and unit testing
Experience with Windows Oracle ASP.NET
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and define software requirements.
Design, develop, and maintain VB.NET applications and solutions.
Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality, maintainability, and performance
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies to suggest improvements and innovative solutions.

title: Project Manager
description: Develop and manage project plans
Communicate with stakeholders and keep them updated on project progress Negotiate and manage contracts with vendors
Track and manage project budgets
Identify and mitigate risks
Resolve project issues
Ensure that projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the required specifications

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze and interpret complex datasets to extract meaningful insights.
Create visualizations and reports to communicate findings effectively.
Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand data needs.
Develop and maintain data models and databases.
Ensure data quality and integrity through validation processes.
Support decision-making by providing actionable data-driven recommendations.
